Module ntnu.idatt1002
Package ntnu.idatt1002.controllers

Class ConfirmationRepeatDelController

java.lang.Object
ntnu.idatt1002.controllers.ConfirmationRepeatDelController
public class ConfirmationRepeatDelController
extends java.lang.Object
Meant to be called in a TaskController. Controls a confirmation popup.

  • Method Details

    • display

      public static void display​(TaskController task, java.lang.String operation) throws java.io.IOException
      Displays a popup for repeatable tasks. For use when clicking "finish" or "delete" task. Changes layout based on the String operation. Takes a TaskController in order to control the task. Takes a String to determine the textFields and outcome of methods.
      Parameters:
      task - TaskController for controlling the task.
      operation - String for determining outcome of methods.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • clickCancelButton

      void clickCancelButton​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Hides popup.
      Parameters:
      event - ActionEvent not in use.

    • clickConfirmButton

      void clickConfirmButton​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws java.io.IOException
      Checks if checkBoxAll is selected. Calls this.taskController.setTaskIsRepeatable(false) if false. Checks if checkBoxSingle is selected. If true: checks operation and executes delete task or finish task.
      Parameters:
      event - ActionEvent
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • setTaskController

      public void setTaskController​(TaskController taskController)
      For setting parent task, in order to access its methods.
      Parameters:
      taskController -
